alert.note: Alert for Central Chaffee County Below 9000 Ft; Western Chaffee County Between 9000 and 11000 Ft; Western Mosquito Range, East Chaffee County above 9000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued May 19 at 5:11PM MDT until May 21 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON FRIDAY TO 6 AM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches over the upper Arkansas River Valley floor and 5 to 12 inches over the southern Mosquito Mountains. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Chaffee County and the southern Mosquito Mountains. * WHEN...From noon Friday to 6 AM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy, wet snow could cause damage to tree branches and power lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
